Classes in com.compendium.core.datamodel.services used by com.compendium.core.datamodel
ICodeGroupService
          The interface for the CodeGroupService class The CodeGroupService class provides services to manipuate code group data in the database.
ICodeService
          The interface for the CodeService class The CodeService class provides remote services to manipuate code objects in the database.
IExternalConnectionService
          The interface for the ExternalConnectionService class The ExternalConnection service class provides services to manipuate ExternalConnection objects in the Connections table.
IFavoriteService
          The interface for the FavoriteService class The Favorite service class provides remote services to manipuate Favorite data in the database.
IGroupCodeService
          The interface for the GroupCodeService class The GroupCode service class provides remote services to manipuate GroupCode records in the database.
ILinkService
          The interface for the LinkService class The LinkService class provides services to manipuate Link record data in the database.
IMeetingService
          The interface for the MeetingService class The MeetingService service class provides services to manipuate records in the MediaIndex and Meeting table.
INodeService
          The interface for the NodeService class The node service class provides remote services to manipuate node objects.
IQueryService
          The interface for the QueryService class The QueryService class provides services to run general node search queries of the database.
ISystemService
          The interface for the SystemService class.
IUserService
          The interface for the UserService class The code service class provides remote services to manipuate code objects.
IViewLayerService
          The interface for the ViewLayerService class The ViewLayer service class provides remote services to manipuate ViewLayer data.
IViewPropertyService
          The interface for the ViewPropertyService class The ViewProperty service class provides remote services to manipuate View Property data.
IViewService
          The interface for the ViewService class The ViewService class provides services to manipuate view objects in the database.
IWorkspaceService
          The interface for the WorkspaceService class The Workspace service class provides remote services to manipuate Workspace data.
